Class CashierOrdersController

java.lang.Object
CashierOrdersController
public class CashierOrdersController extends Object
Controller class for managing the Cashier Orders interface.

This class handles user interactions for a POS (Point-of-Sale) system that sells boba drinks. It fetches menu items from the database, calculates totals, handles order submissions, and updates the database and screen.

Author:
Naomi Dao
